content: The full Iron Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 3 - The New West. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating Yin Tiger within the Zodiac Realm. You will need to fight Chen Loong and obtain the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet from Xu Dog he requests to gain access to the realm. Once in the realm you can fight Yin Tiger by challenging him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Iron_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Iron Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Iron Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 3 - The New West. It is craftable at any Shrine upon defeating Yin Tiger within the Zodiac Realm. You will need to fight Chen Loong and obtain the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet from Xu Dog he requests to gain access to the realm. Once in the realm you can fight Yin Tiger by challenging him.
